document_data.name: The Drinn
document_data.mainbody: '''The Drinn''' were a tribe of [[kobold]]s in [[northwest Faer√ªn]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: The tribe was led by a kobold named [[Olgloth Ryndrinn]].
document_data.Activities: The Drinn often slew any miners they encountered in their mountains. They also sometimes conducted attacks on [[Citadel Adbar]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Drinn made their home somewhere in the [[Ice Mountains]] north of [[Ascore]].
document_data.Members: There were around 3,700 kobolds within this tribe.
